text: She labelled boyfriend Alex Rodriguez her'twin soul'as she accepted the Michael Jackson Vanguard Award at the 2018 MTV VMAs. And Jennifer Lopez and A - Rod looked like soulmates as they put on a saucy display at her star - studded MTV VMAs after - party at NYC hotspot Beauty & Essex. The singer, 49, fresh from her 11 - hit medley at the awards, danced on her hunky baseball player beau, 43, as they revelled in her success.
